elevator

Class Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • elevator.Person

  • public abstract class Person
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Person(int personId, java.util.Random rand)
      The constructor for the class person.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void countWaitTimer()
      Increases the amount of time someone has been waiting by 1 tick.
      int getCurrentDestination()
      Returns the destination of the person.
      int getCurrentFloor()
      Returns the location of the person.
      int getPersonId()
      Returns the ID of the person.
      boolean getPriority()
      Returns whether the person has priority for getting in the lift.
      int getSize()
      Returns the size of the person, for determining the elevator capacity.
      int getWaitTimer()
      Returns the amount of time this person has spent waiting for lifts all day.
      int halfFloorFormula()
      A formula that neatly halves the number of floors in the building, rounding up.
      void leave()
      Called at the end of the day or when a client gets fed up waiting, this method sets the person's destination to 0 and calls the lift.
      void setCurrentFloor(int currentFloor)
      Sets the location of the person to a floor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Person

        public Person(int personId,
              java.util.Random rand)
        The constructor for the class person. As an abstract class, this is only called as superclass constructor.
        Parameters:
        personId - This is used to display people in the GUI.
        rand - To ensure the same seed of Random is used for everything, the Random object is passed to the constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentDestination

        public int getCurrentDestination()
        Returns the destination of the person.
        Returns:
        The integer number denoting the current destination floor.

      • getCurrentFloor

        public int getCurrentFloor()
        Returns the location of the person.
        Returns:
        The integer number denoting the current floor.

      • getPersonId

        public int getPersonId()
        Returns the ID of the person.
        Returns:
        The person ID as an integer.

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns the size of the person, for determining the elevator capacity.
        Returns:
        The size of the person (should be either 1 or 4)

      • getPriority

        public boolean getPriority()
        Returns whether the person has priority for getting in the lift.
        Returns:
        Boolean of priority (clients have it, others do not)

      • leave

        public void leave()
        Called at the end of the day or when a client gets fed up waiting, this method sets the person's destination to 0 and calls the lift. Should only be called when the person is not currently in the lift.

      • setCurrentFloor

        public void setCurrentFloor(int currentFloor)
        Sets the location of the person to a floor. This also stops the person from being flagged as waiting for the lift, as this method is used when they have arrived at their destination.
        Parameters:
        currentFloor - The floor you want to put the person on.

      • halfFloorFormula

        public int halfFloorFormula()
        A formula that neatly halves the number of floors in the building, rounding up.
        Returns:
        The number of floors in the building / 2, rounded up.

      • countWaitTimer

        public void countWaitTimer()
        Increases the amount of time someone has been waiting by 1 tick.

      • getWaitTimer

        public int getWaitTimer()
        Returns the amount of time this person has spent waiting for lifts all day.
        Returns:
